name: Fillet o Fish Burger Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Fillet o Fish Burger Recipe: Boneless fish ½ kg Flour 1 cup Egg 1 White Pepper ½ tsp Salt ½ tsp Oil for frying Mustard paste 1 tsp Bread crumbs 1 cup Garlic powder 1 tsp Cheese (sliced) 3 Burger bun 3 Iceberg (shredded) 1 cup Mayonnaise 5 tbsp Ketchup 6 tbsp Potato chips 2 cup
instructions: In fish add salt, mustard paste, garlic powder and white pepper mix and leave to marinate for half an hour. Then fillet fish coat in flour now coat with egg and bread crumb then fry deep in oil . Then cheese slices keep on top and fry potatoes chips fry and set aside . Now on top of bread toast spread the mayonnaise Then ice berg and 1 tbsp of ketchup spread Then keep fish patty and 1 tbsp of ketchup spread . Finally serve with fries.
